Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25620 affecting package cert-manager for versions less than 1.11.2-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25620 affecting package cert-manager for versions less than 1.11.2-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cert-manager is earlier than 1.11.2-13, affected by CVE-2024-25620
